featured.text: Most men use more swear words, while far more women use adjectives such as “super” and “lovely,” and exclamations such as “Goodness me!” and “Oh dear!”
I love them.” 17 this, Aesop answered, “I’m happy to tell you, my dear friend, that you’ll find the people of Athens much the same.”

definition.zh_def: 親愛的，表示對某人的親密或喜愛。
definition.en_def: A term of endearment used to address someone affectionately.
definition.example: She wrote a dear letter to her grandmother.
